item.title: Here’s what recent history says happens after the S&P 500 breaches this critical level
item.description: The current market volatility offers opportunity, says NewEdge Wealth

item.title: Nasdaq wants to launch 24-hour trading Monday through Friday. Here are the challenges it faces.
item.description: Nasdaq Inc. on Friday announced the most ambitious plan yet by a major U.S. exchange operator to allow stocks to be traded around the clock.

item.title: Intuitive Machines’ stock plunge after moon landing is an ‘overreaction’: analyst
item.description: Intuitive Machines’ Athena moon landing may have suffered the same fate as its Odysseus lander last year and toppled over on the lunar surface.

item.title: Wayfair’s technology investments are allowing it to cut hundreds of tech jobs
item.description: Stock bounces off a two-year low as Wayfair says it expects to see savings from its job cuts in the second half of 2025.

item.title: State Street’s private-debt ETF launched with major buzz. What are investors getting?
item.description: A recently launched ETF actively managed by State Street Global Advisors has been drawing attention for bringing private credit to the masses.
